title: Brown Sugar and Maple Ham
directions: Place the ham fat side up/cut side down on a rack in a foil-lined roasting pan.
Score the fat and insert the cloves (if using).
Bake at 325° for about 18 minutes per pound, until meat thermometer reads 145°.
In a medium sauce pan combine the syrup, brown sugar, Apple juice, mustard, cinnamon, and ginger.
Bring to a boil and cook for 2 minutes.
About 20 minutes before the ham is done, spoon about half of the glaze over the ham.
After 10 minutes spread the remaining glaze over the ham.
